q: Colin Powell thinks that America`` isn't quite post-racial'' at this time.`` These problems still exist in post-racial America.'' However, he suggested that Henry Louis Gates should not have argued with the policeman arresting him. You don't argue with a police officer, he says. Sergio Marchionne said`` I'm not Carlos Ghosn ,'' referring to the fact that Carlos Ghosn heads both Renault and Nissan- two automakers that have formed an alliance.
